boardgame.name: Sentinel Tactics: The Flame of Freedom
boardgame.description: Sentinel Tactics: The Flame of Freedom is a tactical combat game that uses a hex grid map to represent terrain. Each player controls one or more heroes or villains, each of which has unique powers. Combat is based on the rolling of six-sided dice. Whereas Sentinels of the Multiverse is a fully cooperative game, Sentinel Tactics is a team-based game. Groups of players will cooperate against either a villain player or against another team of players, so while the game is competitive, cooperation and teamwork are still vital to the gameplay._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Greater Than Games (GTGSTACFFRE) Sentinel Tactics: The Flame of Freedom is the hex-grid, dice-based combat game that puts you in control of the heroes and villains who meet in battle across the thrilling comic book pages of Sentinel Comics! Go head-to-head in skirmish play, or experience the stories by playing through the included Scenario Books! Sentinel Tactics: The Flame of Freedom comes with nine characters, three scenario books, and two map locations. Will you take the role of the stalwart heroes or the dastardly villains? The choice is yours in Sentinel Tactics!
These are bundles of Sentinel Tactics including The Flames of Freedom, Uprising and both miniatures packs Buyer to pay paypal fees unless payment sent as a personal payment.
Reserved for Chris Freiberg Includes: Sentinel Tactics: Promo Power Card Pack
